nodes.text: Media Division was a branch of the Corporate Sector Authority. It managed all communications and content for public broadcast throughout the Corporate Sector. Media Division also handled all public relations throughout the Sector, and was responsible for the Sector's image in bordering sectors. It was in charge of all advertising and subliminals, known as sub-verts, as well as propaganda, consumer contests, demographic studies, and labor recruitment. Media was also tasked with producing entertainment programming for the holomedia. Subdivisions included Demographics, Public Relations, Entertainment, Recruitment, and Product Advertising.
